definition: to follow/from/it is for...to/reason/cause/because of/due to/to/to leave it (to sb)/by (introduces passive verb)

sentences.english: Argument against a hydrothermal origin is the sympathetic distribution of uranium and gold.
sentences.chinese: 反对热液成固的理由是铀和金有着一致的分布。

sentences.english: At the end, prospect of the development of the hydrometallurgy of uranium is discussed briefly.
sentences.chinese: 对铀水冶科学技术的今后发展作了讨论。

sentences.english: China's energy policies will also boost demand for uranium.
sentences.chinese: 中国能源政策也会大幅提高铀的需求。

sentences.english: The isotope of uranium with mass number235, fissionable with slow neutrons.
sentences.chinese: 锕铀铀的同位素，原子质量数为235，与慢。

sentences.english: The isotope of uranium with mass number235, fissionable with slow neutrons.
sentences.chinese: 锕铀铀的同位素，原子质量数为235，与慢。

sentences.english: When the uranium disintegrates, it changes into lead.
sentences.chinese: 当铀蜕变时，它变成了铅。

sentences.english: Industrial exports include gold, mercury, uranium, and natural gas and electricity.
sentences.chinese: 工业出口包括黄金，汞，铀，天然气和电力。

sentences.english: Abbott has said if elected he would improve relations between Australia and India, including the sale of uranium.
sentences.chinese: 阿博特曾表示，当选后会增进澳印关系，包括售铀。

sentences.english: Another of the authors supplied Marie with the uranium with which she experimented.
sentences.chinese: 而此信另一个作者也曾经提供玛丽试验所用的铀。

sentences.english: When an atom of U235 is split, several neutrons are set free.
sentences.chinese: 一个铀235原子分裂时，释放出几个中子。

sentences.english: The method could well prove effective in defining broad areas of uranium favourability.
sentences.chinese: 该法在圈定大面积的铀成矿有利区方面可能是有效的。

sentences.english: A salt obtained by the reaction of uranium salts with oxalic acid .
sentences.chinese: 铀盐和草酸反应产生的一种盐。

sentences.english: The treatment of uranium-containing wastewater by biosorption is a new technology.
sentences.chinese: 生物吸附法处理含铀废水是新兴的研究领域。

sentences.english: Followed by the slow decomposition of uranium to another element thorium .
sentences.chinese: 铀元素随后缓慢分解为另一种元素钍。

sentences.english: USEC depends upon the Russian uranium to fund its future enrichment facility program.
sentences.chinese: 离心机取决于俄罗斯的铀基金，其未来的浓缩设施。

definition: deuterium 2H/heavy hydrogen, isotope of hydrogen having 1 neutron in its nucleus, so atomic weight 2
tritium 3H/radioactive isotope of hydrogen having 2 neutrons in its nucleus, so atomic weight 3
